channel.title: Mark My Words
channel.description: Recent content on Mark My Words

item.title: Obligatory First Post
item.description: Hello there! Welcome to my personal website and, more specifically, my blog section. I am flattered to see that someone was interested in what I had to say. I’ll mainly use this site as a mix of showcasing technical projects and blogging about data science related topics that I find interesting. I’m currently excited about honing my data visualization skills with ggplot2 so if you’re into that sort of thing, check back often!
